original_title: Returning to the Workplace - Creating a Safe and Healthy Office Environment (Working Safely in the Age of the COVID-19 Pandemic)
overview: Life as we know it is changing and disrupting every sector of our lives in the age of COVID-19. The ramifications of the Coronavirus Pandemic have rippled across every aspect of our professional and personal lives. With governments enforcing stringent guidelines to protect its citizens there is much that can be done by businesses when it comes to the safety and wellbeing of employees. Planning how to manage office utilization in a way that members of your organization stay healthy and safe can be a challenging task, but having the right
title: Returning to the Workplace - Creating a Safe and Healthy Office Environment (Working Safely in the Age of the COVID-19 Pandemic)
